application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Tree number - T1Tree type - EucalyptusApprox Height - 18mApprox Crown Spread Diameter - 12mLocation - See mapService - Crown ReductionWork required- Crown reduce by removing approximately 3-3.5m from height and 2-2.5m from sides pruning to suitable growth points. Leaving tree at approximately 15m tall and 8m wide.Reason - As part of continued maintenanceTree number - T2 & T3Tree type - LeylandiiApprox Height - 12mApprox Crown Spread Diameter - 14mLocation - see mapService - Crown ReductionWork required- Crown reduce by removing approximately 2m from height and 1m from sidespruning to suitable growth points leaving tree at approximately 10m tall and 12m wide.Reason - As part of regular maintenance, to allow more light into propertyTree number - G1Tree type - Cypress x 6 (Dead)Approx Height - 3-5mTree number - T4Tree type - CypressApprox Height - 7mApprox Spread - 12mLocation - See mapService - FellWork required- Fell as close to trees current ground level as possible and leave the stump in the groundReason - tree is in decline and has a failed top hanging over adjacent gardens.Tree number - T5Tree type - CherryApprox Height - 5mApprox Crown Spread Diameter - 7mLocation - See mapService - Crown ReductionWork required- Crown reduce back to previous pruning points by removing approximately 1- 2m from all overReason - As part of regular maintenance
